metadata.name: Ontario Gas Regulations Knowledge Base
metadata.description: Ontario Regulations and Code Adoption Documents for gas safety and fuel handling

ontario_regulation_211.description: Ontario Regulation 211/01 under the Technical Standards and Safety Act, 2000, governing propane storage and handling in Ontario

ontario_regulation_212.description: Ontario Regulation 212/01 under the Technical Standards and Safety Act, 2000, governing gaseous fuels (natural gas and propane) in Ontario

ontario_regulation_215.description: Ontario Regulation 215/01 governing fuel certificate requirements and qualifications for fuel handlers

propane_cad.description: CAD amendments to CSA standards for propane in Ontario

gaseous_fuels_cad.description: CAD amendments to CSA standards for natural gas and propane in Ontario

compliance_note: All gas-related content generated by LARK Labs tools must comply with Ontario Regulations 211, 212, and 215 and applicable CSA standards
